To configure incidents to automatically move to a Closed state from Resolved after 7 days, you should:
B. Configure the number of days Resolved incidents automatically close property.
Additionally, you would need to:
D. Enable the auto closure of Incidents based on Resolution date property.
These configurations ensure that incidents are automatically closed after the specified period of inactivity.
